name: Tech Deck Skateboarding @Kids
description:
“…the best mobile skateboarding game around.” – biogamergirl.com
Experience the thrill of being a world class skater in this amazing new skateboarding game. Get ready for an addictive, fun, true skate experience that combines the excitement of dangerous feats with the style of pure street skating.
-See how Tech Deck fingerboards spring to life in the game!
-Find the skater that fits you best!
-Over 144 skateboard decks with tons of designs and abilities!
-Have your own Tech Deck? Scan it into the game and skate with it!
-Chain together grinds, aerials, flips and other fast-paced combos!
-Feel like a real skateboarder!

A wide variety of skating sessions, competitive skateboarding tournaments, skate locales, new combos to master, and even more decks, characters and gear to unlock ensure endless entertainment.
Want the best skateboarding experience on your mobile device? You are in the right place. Download Tech Deck for free and join the skate revolution!
Key Features
STUNNING GRAPHICS
Phenomenal HD quality graphics and smooth animations make this one of the top skating games on mobile.
FAMOUS DECK BRANDS
True-to-life Tech Deck skateboards are in the game! Including Cliche, Enjoi, Almost, Blind, Darkstar, Plan B, Sk8mafia, ATM, Flameboy vs. Wet Willy, Hookups, Black Label, Finesse, Toy Machine, World Industries, Foundation, and Baker.
DAILY REWARDS
There is always a reason to skate! Receive virtual currency for every day you skate with Tech Deck, and get extra energy for winning daily events.
RULE THE CITY
Beat the local champs become the next skating legend.


Our Privacy policy and EULA are accepted by downloading this App.
You can find our privacy policy and EULA at http://www.spinmaster.com/privacy-policy-mobile.php
